alert.note: Alert for Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 5:49PM MDT until August 11 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Idaho County in central Idaho... * Until 515 PM PDT. * At 448 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Grangeville, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and hail up to 1 inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Ferdinand, Winona and Fenn. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
